examples.expected_analysis:
⚠️ **MEDIUM RISK** - System health score: 65.5/100

**Root Cause Analysis:**
Primary bottleneck: User DB (database)
- High CPU usage (62.4%)
- Centrality score: 0.11 (medium impact component)

**Business Impact:** Moderate business impact - Service quality reduced, proactive action needed

**Cascade Analysis:** 1 services affected: Order Management

**Immediate Actions Required:**
1. Review database performance metrics
2. Optimize query patterns and indexing
3. Consider read replica for load distribution

**Architecture Recommendations:**
- Implement observability stack (metrics, logs, traces)
- Set up automated scaling based on performance thresholds
expected_recommendations: Scale User DB: Add 2-3 read replicas immediately
Optimize User DB: Enable slow query logging and fix queries >100ms
Deploy APM monitoring (New Relic/DataDog) for real-time insights
Implement Redis cache layer to reduce DB hits by 60-70%
Review database connection pool settings - increase max connections to 200
Review system architecture for additional optimization opportunities

⚠️ **MEDIUM RISK** - System health score: 58.1/100

**Root Cause Analysis:**
Primary bottleneck: CDN Cache (cache)
- Memory high (74.0%); Eviction pressure
- Centrality score: 0.56 (critical path component)

**Business Impact:** Moderate business impact - Service quality reduced, proactive action needed

**Cascade Analysis:** 1 services affected: Profile API

**Immediate Actions Required:**
1. Scale CDN Cache capacity immediately
2. Investigate cache service performance
3. Implement monitoring and alerting

**Architecture Recommendations:**
- Implement observability stack (metrics, logs, traces)
- Set up automated scaling based on performance thresholds
expected_recommendations: Scale CDN Cache: Increase memory allocation by 50%
Optimize eviction policy: Review LRU settings for better hit rates
Deploy APM monitoring (New Relic/DataDog) for real-time insights
Implement health checks and automated recovery for CDN Cache
Set up performance alerts for cache services
Review system architecture for additional optimization opportunities

examples.expected_analysis:
⚠️ **MEDIUM RISK** - System health score: 70.6/100

**Root Cause Analysis:**
Primary bottleneck: Replica DB (database)
- High CPU usage (66.3%); Memory high (74.7%); Lock contention
- Centrality score: 0.37 (medium impact component)

**Business Impact:** Moderate business impact - Service quality reduced, proactive action needed

**Cascade Analysis:** 1 services affected: User Profile API

**Immediate Actions Required:**
1. Review database performance metrics
2. Optimize query patterns and indexing
3. Consider read replica for load distribution

**Architecture Recommendations:**
- Implement observability stack (metrics, logs, traces)
- Set up automated scaling based on performance thresholds
expected_recommendations: Scale Replica DB: Add 2-3 read replicas immediately
Optimize Replica DB: Enable slow query logging and fix queries >100ms
Deploy APM monitoring (New Relic/DataDog) for real-time insights
Implement Redis cache layer to reduce DB hits by 60-70%
Review database connection pool settings - increase max connections to 200
Review system architecture for additional optimization opportunities
